H0.text: Food provides skin color for all organisms that need food to survive.

H1.text: Food provides oxygen for life is the statement that best describes the purpose of food for organisms, as all organisms need food to survive.

H2.text: Food provides water for energy is the purpose of food for organisms, because all organisms need food to survive.

H3.text: Food provides energy for growth, the purpose of food for organisms that all need food to survive.

A4.text: The conversion of energy in food into a usable form for cellular processes is a primary function of metabolism.

A5.text: Catabolism breaks down food molecules to provide energy and components needed by anabolic reactions which build molecules.
